column2: REFACTORS
column14: Refactor involves refactoring the front end code and moving the game variables to the backend. The file structure is modularized.

column2: LEADERBOARD
column14: The leaderboard page can be viewed by the user after login. At the end of a game, the player's top score is featured on the global leaderboard. Every category has an individual leaderboard on the leaderboard page.

column2: GAMEPLAY ELEMENTS
column14: Gameplay elements are featured on the 'Play' page of the application. These features give the players a smooth quizzing experience.

column2: PLAYER PROFILE
column14: The 'Player Profile' page in the app reflects the user's details like  username, top scores and email. Users can edit their email, username and password through the profile page.

column2: SUPERUSER FUNCTIONS
column14: A superuser is a privileged account which is primarily used for administration. These privileges include deleting leaderboard scores and manipulating questions in the questions database
